sentences.sContent: George’s sister was married to an Italian.
sentences.sCn: 乔治的姐姐嫁给了一个意大利人。

sentences.sContent: He was first cousin to King Philip VI.
sentences.sCn: 他是国王腓力六世的表亲。

sentences.sContent: The robbery may be linked to other crimes of violence.
sentences.sCn: 这次抢劫有可能和其他暴力犯罪有关联。

synos.tran: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向

trans.tranOther: used to show a relationship with someone or something
